1687010.name: The Savoury Inspector
1687010.description:
Like the tooth-fairy, pixies and the like, there is a world that many people don't believe in or know even exists. Deep down under our feet is a place full of Inspectors that inspect consumer food before it hits the supermarket shelf.

For real!

In this case we follow The Savoury Inspector and his new apprentice (that is you) on what turns out to be a not normal training day. A day that turns out to be not very savoury indeed.

Your mission?! To get graded without being failed and to have the most fun doing so.

And why is this going to be so much fun?! Because the inspector is going to react to your actions and presence! That's right, a VR NPC you can actually prod, pull, throw things at, and be an all round pain-in-the-bum. And he'll let you know about it! Just... don't annoy him too much.



  • Physics based interactions.
  • Puzzles that’ll stretch the very sinews of your mind (a slight embellishment!)
  • Bad jokes (not embellished!)
  • NPC interactions and reactions to player’s presence and actions (the real fun!)
  • Receive a graded certificate recognised worldwide by the food authorities (not entirely truthful).
  • Professionally voiced by Mel Shiner (factually accurate).
  • Amazing music! Composed by the very talented Luca Fagagnini (accurately factual).
  • Based on a flash fiction story written by... me! (how original).

Do note, the play time will probably last around a couple of hours.
1687010.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
